snippet: Massachusetts' highest court on Monday threw out a lawsuit seeking to block Tesla Motors Inc from selling its luxury electric cars directly to consumers in the state, enabling it to bypass traditional dealerships....

headline.print_headline: Tesla Prevails in Top Massachusetts Court Over Direct Sales
headline.main: Tesla Prevails in Top Massachusetts Court Over Direct Sales

lead_paragraph: Massachusetts' highest court on Monday threw out a lawsuit seeking to block Tesla Motors Inc from selling its luxury electric cars directly to consumers in the state, enabling it to bypass traditional dealerships.
